channel.title: Xeonix 508!
channel.description:
Make sure your client is not too old else you will get crashed w/o mapdata. If you need client: [CODE]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XDW0WZ28[/CODE]
Are you looking for challenge? For a server that is NOT filled with maxed players? Tired of people losing Godswords and just withdrawing new ones? Overpowered weapons? Unbalanced defence bonuses? Join Xeonix for Low-Xp rates on certain stats ( with High-Xp rates on other ones). WE GOT CHALLENGE. It might be slightly hard but deliberate and determined gameplay will lead you to success and ability to enjoy the game. There is no starter as I am confident majority of you would abuse it in pursuit of material affluence. o.O On the other hand we offer: Well-weighed PK system. Developing stable economics. Ability to train most of skills Agility Runecrafting Mining Smithing ( 90% of items ) Crafting ( Dragon hide, jewellery ) Herblore ( Most of potions with correct stats' boosts ) Slayer Woodcutting Firemaking Fishing Cooking Thieving Farming Hunter ( With working traps! ) Summoning ( Perfect following, bring xp in combat, training system requiring both charms and money ) Fletching ( Includes all bows, tips to bolts, arrows ) Magic ( With superheat, enchanting and etc ) Construction ( Half done, can be added by requests )
Miscellaneous: Jad-minigame which actually requires prayer switching. 4 GWD bosses that cannot be soloed and require tactics. Teleports delivering you to any point of Xeonix World. Shops providing everything to start/skill with.
Benefits for loyal players. Fixes of glitches that you find. Taking action against staff abusing their powers. Access to numerous features all over the xeonix world. Of course bank-x options, skillcapes, godswords, ancients, trade, shops, lunars blahblahblah.. Everyone got it so not worth mentioning.
[img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/autocast.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/trading.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Untitled.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/farming.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/jad.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/ags%20spec.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Arma.gif[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Crafting.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Firemaking.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Fishing.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Fletching.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Mining.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Smithing.JPG[/img] [img]http://xeonix.shacknet.nu/images/Woodcutting.JPG[/img]

item.title: Xeonix 508!
item.dc:creator: @range_2her range 2her
item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

Make sure your client is not too old else you will get crashed w/o mapdata.
If you need client:

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XDW0WZ28

Are you looking for challenge? For a server that is NOT filled with maxed players? Tired of people losing Godswords and just withdrawing new ones? Overpowered weapons? Unbalanced defence bonuses?
Join Xeonix for Low-Xp rates on certain stats ( with High-Xp rates on other ones).
WE GOT CHALLENGE. It might be slightly hard but deliberate and determined gameplay will lead you to success and ability to enjoy the game.
There is no starter as I am confident majority of you would abuse it in pursuit of material affluence. o.O
On the other hand we offer:
Well-weighed PK system.
Developing stable economics.
Ability to train most of skills
Agility
Runecrafting
Mining
Smithing ( 90% of items )
Crafting ( Dragon hide, jewellery )
Herblore ( Most of potions with correct stats’ boosts )
Slayer
Woodcutting
Firemaking
Fishing
Cooking
Thieving
Farming
Hunter ( With working traps! )
Summoning ( Perfect following, bring xp in combat, training system requiring both charms and money )
Fletching ( Includes all bows, tips to bolts, arrows )
Magic ( With superheat, enchanting and etc )
Construction ( Half done, can be added by requests )

Miscellaneous:
Jad-minigame which actually requires prayer switching.
4 GWD bosses that cannot be soloed and require tactics.
Teleports delivering you to any point of Xeonix World.
Shops providing everything to start/skill with.

Benefits for loyal players.
Fixes of glitches that you find.
Taking action against staff abusing their powers.
Access to numerous features all over the xeonix world.
Of course bank-x options, skillcapes, godswords, ancients, trade, shops, lunars blahblahblah… Everyone got it so not worth mentioning.
